title: Area of one fitness centre /Yogalaya for a Co-Op
clause_text: Area of one fitness centre /Yogalaya for a Co-Op. Housing Society or Apartment Owners Association as provided in sub-regulation 37(28). The fire chutes as provided under DC Regulation No. 48(9) The refuge areas subject to DC Regulation No. 48(8)

source_pdf.text_snippet: Area of one fitness centre /Yogalaya for a Co-Op. Housing Society or Apartment Owners Association as provided in sub-regulation 37(28).
